publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1117.3 Carolyn Leckie: The Failure of the BBC to Hand Over Tapes to the Fraser Inquiry-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1117) in the name of David McLetchie, leave out from "believes" to end and insert "however places these ongoing concerns in the context of the Ministry of Defence's overspend of £3 billion in the last year alone; notes that this included an overspend of £1.3 billion on the Astute Class Submarine, and further defends the rights of the BBC and journalists to protect their sources." Supported by: Frances Curran*
